MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.45am to carry out repairs to faulty electrical equipment at Glencairn Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.26am on Monday 22nd February 2021.
